content: in this legal case a court in rome issued a final resolution between two parties the plaintiff mr ba kh filed a complaint against the defendant ms ba sa regarding the occupation of a property in rome the court partially accepted the plaintiffs complaint and ordered the defendant to pay compensation for the occupation of the property from may 2013 to may 2023 the court also partially accepted the defendants counterclaim and ordered the dissolution of coownership of several properties giving full ownership to the defendant the defendant was also ordered to pay the plaintiff a certain amount for the adjustment of ownership the court referred to various articles of the civil code in its decision the court considered the plaintiffs claim for rental value of the property and determined the amount to be paid by the defendant the court also addressed the defendants counterclaim including reimbursement of expenses and division of the hereditary property the court ordered the plaintiff to repay certain amounts and ruled on the management of a current account the court decided to assign full ownership of the property to the defendant instead of selling it at auction the court also ordered the plaintiff to repay certain amounts related to the hereditary property finally the court addressed the issue of the management of a current account and ordered the plaintiff to pay a certain amount the court divided the costs of the case between the parties the ruling was made on may 18 2023 in rome
